Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 34 points, had 11 assists, and 8 rebounds to lead the Hornets to a 110-105 win over Houston
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball expressed his happiness to be back on the court after his tough stretch
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets trailed by as many as 18 points before surging late to rally for the victory
Others: First-year coach Charles Lee praised LaMelo Ball's commitment to being great and his impact on the team
